Tenant.Name: Name
Tenant.SwitchTenantHint: Leave the name field blank to switch to the host side.

Home.quickTemplateDescription: Quick Templates provide an out-of-the-box development framework for the rapid development of modern web applications by combining the respective advantages of ABP and Ext JS with the necessary encapsulation. Through this framework, you can learn both ABP and Ext JS knowledge. The quick templates also offer another option to write all the pages in Svelte, yes, including the admin interface.

About.description: Quick Template is an open-source project maintained by the Admiral that demonstrates how to use frameworks such as ABP, ExtJS, and Svelte for rapid development.
About.aboutMe: Senior web technology expert, with more than 20 years of work experience, has been committed to the research of web development frameworks.

validation.number: The field must be a number.
validation.date: The field must be a date.
validation.minDate: The field must be on or after {0}.
validation.maxDate: The field must be on or before {0}.
validation.invalidDate: The field is not a valid date.
validation.min: The field must be greater than or equal to {0}.
validation.max: The field must be less than or equal to {0}.
validation.minLength: The field must be a string or array type with a minimum length of {0}.
validation.maxLength: The field must be a string or array type with a maximum length of {0}.
validation.length: The field must be a string or array type with a length of {0}.
validation.email: The field must be a valid email address.
validation.requireDigit: The field must contain at least one digit.
validation.requireLowercase: The field must contain at least one lowercase letter.
validation.requireUppercase: The field must contain at least one uppercase letter.
validation.requireNonAlphanumeric: The field must contain at least one non-alphanumeric character.
validation.url: The field must be a valid URL.
